articles.title: Why Truist Sees Salesforce (CRM) Positioned for AI-Driven Growth
articles.mainIdea: Why Truist Sees Salesforce (CRM) Positioned for AI-Driven Growth
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Why Truist Sees Salesforce (CRM) Positioned for AI-Driven Growth. Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On December 15, Truist Securities reiterated its Buy rating on the stock with a price target of $380.00. The rating affirmation follows Salesforce’s Agentforce customer event. According to the research firm, 3QFY26 represented “a solid progress report” on Agentforce and the […] Related tickers mentioned: TFC.

articles.title: How Investors May Respond To Salesforce (CRM) Q3 Beat And Surging Enterprise AI Adoption
articles.mainIdea: How Investors May Respond To Salesforce (CRM) Q3 Beat And Surging Enterprise AI Adoption
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: How Investors May Respond To Salesforce (CRM) Q3 Beat And Surging Enterprise AI Adoption. In recent weeks, Salesforce reported record third-quarter fiscal 2026 results, raised its full-year guidance, and highlighted rapid adoption of its AI products Agentforce and Data 360, underpinned by new deployments at organizations such as Novartis, the U.S. Department of Transportation, and DeVry University. These developments point to Salesforce’s AI platform becoming more deeply embedded in critical workflows across healthcare, government, and education, potentially reinforcing customer... articles.title: Winshear Receives TSX-V Consent for the Option Agreement on the Portsoy Nickel – Copper – Cobalt Project, Scotland
articles.mainIdea: Winshear Receives TSX-V Consent for the Option Agreement on the Portsoy Nickel – Copper – Cobalt Project, Scotland
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Winshear Receives TSX-V Consent for the Option Agreement on the Portsoy Nickel – Copper – Cobalt Project, Scotland. VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Dec. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Winshear Gold Corp. (TSXV: WINS) (‘Winshear’ or the ‘Company’) reports that the Company has received final approval from the TSX Venture Exchange (the ‘TSX-V’) for the arms-length agreement with Peak Nickel Limited (“Peak Nickel”), a private UK registered company, whereby Winshear can earn a 100% interest in the 250km2 Portsoy Project, located in Aberdeenshire, Northeast Scotland (Map 1) (see news release dated August 11, 2025).
